title: T204 McConnell and Lord now sold
author: shammus

posts.post_title: T204 McConnell and Lord now sold
posts.post_content:
The McConnell SGC 20 looks like a "50" on the front...no wear or wrinkling and in very nice shape.  He does have some pencil tracings/markings on the back.  Lord has a small tear along his jawline that is tough to pick up in the scan.  On the whole, it's a pretty displayable example as well though he would technically be in poor-fair condition.

Still, you don't see the Boston players come up too often so here's a good shot at a couple of them!

McConnell sold....Lord now $45...

Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
McConnell has been sold....Lord is still available though....
Bump for lower price on Lord...now only $45!
